name: Hired On Sight
description: Get instantly hired as the applicant. [Note: Don't leave from your seat until 47 gets up by himself].

options.name: Hired in the room
options.tooltip: Get hired in the interview room. [NOTE: Dont stand up until 47 gets up by himself]

options.name: Hired at the reception
options.tooltip: Get hired when approaching the receptionist at the reception desk.
